string.name: menu_filter_by_criteria_type
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed disabilities by criteria type.

string.name: disability_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the disability detail screen.

string.name: hidden_disability_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'hidden_disabilities' screen where the user can see the list of disabilities that have been added to their hidden_disability.

string.name: disability_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the disability list screen where the user can see a list of disabilities available to add to their hidden_disabilities.

string.name: disability_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the disability details screen where the user can see the details for a specific disability.

string.name: navigation_drawer_header_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the image that is shown at the top of the navigation drawer.

string.name: added_disability_to_hidden_disabilities
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a disability to their hidden_disabilities.

string.name: hidden_disabilities_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'Hidden_Disability screen when no disability have been added to the user's hidden_disability

string.name: disability_date
string.translation_description: Text with placeholders that indicates when the disability was added. Example: 'Invisible_disabilities added on 26 Dec, 2020'.

string.name: menu_item_share_disability
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: menu_item_share_coping_strategy
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: share_text_disability
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a disability on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s disability in the Android Invisible_Disabilities app

string.name: a11y_disability_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the disability images shown in the 'hidden_disabilities' and 'Disability list' screens.
